title: Publications

Feltman, B., Warwick, A.R., Knowlton, G., Pomeranz, E., Zwickle, A., Burmann, L., Burroughs, J., Schweihofer, J., Conklin, T., Montri, D. and Isenhoff, D., 2024. Wild game processors’ perceptions of chronic wasting disease risks in Michigan. Human Dimensions of Wildlife, 29(5), pp.513-521. Download PDF

title: About
text: Hi, my name is Garrett Knowlton. I am a PhD student in the Ecosystem and Landscape Ecology Lab at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. My research focuses on understanding how forest landscapes might change into the future under different climate and disturbance scenarios. My broader interests include climate change adaptation, science policy, and conducting actionable science for land management.

title: Garrett J. Knowlton
text:
Hi, my name is Garrett Knowlton. I am a graduate student at the University of Wisconsin-Madison in the Ecosystem and Landscape Ecology Lab. My research interests include landscape ecology, forest ecosystems, disturbances (especially fire), simulation modeling, and climate change adaptation.

Education
University of Wisconsin - Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA PhD in Integrative Biology | 2024 - Present
University of Wisconsin - Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA MS in Integrative Biology | 2022 - 2024
Michigan State University, East Lansing, Michigan, USA B.S. in Fisheries and Wildlife Biology | 2015-2020
